item.title: Font size test for body copy
item.description:
24px

A wonderful serenity has taken possession of my entire soul, like these sweet mornings of spring which I enjoy with my whole heart. I am alone, and feel the charm of existence in this spot, which was created for the bliss of souls like mine. I am so happy, my dear friend, so absorbed in the exquisite sense of mere tranquil existence, that I neglect my talents. I should be incapable of drawing a single stroke at the present moment; and yet I feel that I never was a greater artist than now. When, while the lovely valley teems with vapour around me, and the meridian sun strikes the upper surface of the impenetrable foliage of my trees, and but a few stray gleams steal into the inner sanctuary, I throw myself down among the tall grass by the trickling stream; and, as I lie close to the earth, a thousand unknown plants are noticed by me: when I hear the buzz of the little world among the stalks, and grow familiar with the countless indescribable forms of the insects and flies, then I feel the presence of the Almighty, who formed us in his own image.

item.title: 王海亮
item.description:
• https://h12.me
  • https://github.com/h12w

软件开发深耕十余年，国内Go语言顶尖技术人才，Golang Meetup讲师，阿里SDK悬赏奖金获得者，百余项开源软件作者和积极贡献者，数据挖掘论文在悉尼ICC会议交流。对后端和分布式架构有深刻理解，如：API协议设计，消息系统，数据库引擎和实时分析等。

  • 中国顶级Go语言开发者
    • aliyun-oss-go-sdk: 赢取阿里云 OSS SDK 设计竞赛奖金
    • Github 超过 100个项目
  • 后端架构和算法专家
    • Appcoach Market: CTR/CVR 估计模型和实时流分析
    • h12.me/sej: 分布式消息系统
    • h12.me/kpax: 2个月内成为 Kafka 专家并实现 Go 语言客户端
    • h12.me/html-query: 函数式 HTML DOM 提取
    • h12.me/buid: 分布式消息 BUID 生成器
  • 执着写出测试正确且优雅的代码
    • h12.me/gspec: 并发可扩展Go测试框架
    • h12.me/realtest: 基于 Docker 的真实测试环境
  • 在语法分析器和代码生成方面拥有丰富经验
    • h12.me/gombi: combinator-style 词法和语法分析库
    • h12.me/ua: User Agent 解析和和设备检测
    • h12.me/wipro: 解析 BNF 生成二进制协议代码
    • h12.me/xsd: XSD 解析生成器
    • h12.me/json-schema: JSON Schema 解析生成器

工作经历

  • Appcoach (2015 - present)

    广告平台产品技术负责人 & 后端开发主管

    • Appcoach Market 是一个跨数据中心, 水平可扩展和高可用的广告投放平台，支持:
      • 自动竞价和规则投放策略
      • 实时数据分析和报表
      • 集成多家 public/private DSPs/SSPs
    • 技术:
      • 高可用，高吞吐率和低延迟的 API (Go, 亚马逊 AWS & 腾讯云)
      • 分布式消息系统 (sej)
      • 分布式实时分析 (基于BadgerDB)
      • 内存数据库和规则引擎 (CQRS架构)
      • 服务自动部署系统 (基于Saltstack & Go)

  • IBM/SPSS (2009 - 2011)

    软件工程师

    • 市场调研分析产品: Data Collection (C#)

  • Qimonda (2006 - 2009)

    软件工程师

    • 晶元测试系统 (C++, Ruby, Python)

教育

  • 西安交通大学

    博士生, 2011 - 2015

    • 从 2012 起积极参与开源软件的开发 (Go)
    • Exploring the Efficiency and Mechanism of Whistleblowing System on Social Networking Site (论文发表于 IEEE ICC 2014)

  • 西安交通大学

    系统工程硕士, 2004 - 2007

  • Xi’an Jiaotong University

    信息与工信工程学士, 2000 - 2004

item.title: Resume
item.description:
Wáng Hǎiliàng (Hal)

  • https://h12.me
  • https://github.com/h12w

Highlights

A software developer that has been passionate about programming for more than ten years. He has a deep understanding on backend and distributed technologies, like API protocol design, messaging systems, database engines and real-time analytics. He is also a Go expert, an open source author and contributor of dozens of projects.

  • One of the top Go developers in China
    • aliyun-oss-go-sdk: winner in the open contest for Aliyun OSS Go SDK
    • Open source projects exceed one hundred
  • Backend architecture & algorithm expert
    • Appcoach Market: CTR/CVR estimation model and real-time analytics in Go
    • h12.me/sej: distributed messaging system
    • h12.me/kpax: became a Kafka expert and wrote the Kafka client in 2 months
    • h12.me/html-query: fluent & functional HTML DOM extraction
    • h12.me/buid: bipartite unique identifier generator
  • Obsessed with writing well-tested, elegant code
    • h12.me/gspec: an expressive, reliable, concurrent and extensible Go test framework
    • h12.me/realtest: real test environment for Go unit testing, based on Docker
  • Strong Experience in parser and generator
    • h12.me/gombi: combinator-style scanner & parser library
    • h12.me/ua: User Agent parser and device detection
    • h12.me/xsd: generate Go struct from XSD spec
    • h12.me/json-schema: generate Go struct from JSON Schema
    • h12.me/schemata: database scheme extractor & code generator

Experience

  • Appcoach (2015 - present)

    Technical Director of Ad Network Product & Backend Lead of R&D

    • Appcoach Market is a multi-regional, horizontal scalable and fault tolerant ad network that supports:
      • automatic bidding algorithm and rule-based campaign strategy
      • instant data analysis and reporting capability
      • rich protocols to integrate with public/private DSPs/SSPs
    • Technologies:
      • API with high availibility, high throughput and low latency (Go, AWS & Tencent Cloud)
      • distriubted messaging system in Go (h12.me/sej)
      • distributed real-time analytics (based on sej & BadgerDB)
      • in-memory database & rule engine in Go (CQRS architecture)
      • automatic service deployment (Saltstack & Go)

  • IBM/SPSS (2009 - 2011)

    Software Engineer

    • Market research product: Data Collection (C#)

  • Qimonda (2006 - 2009)

    Software Engineer

    • Testing system for DRAM wafer. (C++, Ruby, Python)

Education

  • Xi’an Jiaotong University

    PhD Student, 2011 - 2015

    • Open source programmer since 2012 (Go)
    • Exploring the Efficiency and Mechanism of Whistleblowing System on Social Networking Site (published on IEEE ICC 2014)

  • Xi’an Jiaotong University

    M.S. in Systems Engineering, 2004 - 2007

  • Xi’an Jiaotong University

    B.S. in Information and Communication Engineering, 2000 - 2004

item.title: About
item.description:
The Author

Wáng Hǎiliàng is a software developer that has been passionate about programming for more than ten years. He is an open source author and contributor of dozens of projects. You can reach him by email at w@h12.me.

This Site

Tools

  • Container: Docker
  • CSS: Sass, Compass & Susy
  • Font: Google Fonts
  • Icon: Font Awesome & Fontello
  • Image editting: Inkscape, GIMP & OptiPNG
  • Resource loading: HeadJS
  • Static page generator: Hugo
  • Syntax highlight: Highlight.js

Services

  • CDN: CloudFlare
  • Continuous deployment: Docker Hub & Docker Cloud
  • Domain name & email: Google Domains
  • Full text search: Google Custom Search
  • Host: Vultr
  • Version control: Github

item.title: Pagination Done Right
item.description:
Server side pagination is intrinsically not accurate, as long as the data is dynamic.

The data items could be inserted, deleted or changed on the server side while the user goes forward and backward among the pages.

However, there is an algorithm that can keep the pagination as stable as possible:

  1. encode the id and sorting fields of last value in a page as the continue-token
  2. return the continue-token along with each page
  3. the client must pass the continue-token to fetch the next page
  4. the next page starts with value > continue-token || (value == continue-token && value.id > continue-token.id)

Reference

  • Pagination with Dynamic Data Loading

item.title: How to Measure Response Time with Curl
How to Delete a Git Branch
item.description:
git fetch       --prune  origin
git branch      --delete [branch-name]
git push origin --delete [branch-name]

item.title: A Single Command to Download a Website
How to Remove Old Kernels in Ubuntu
item.description:
sudo apt install byobu
sudo purge-old-kernels

  • Remove Old Kernels (https://help.ubuntu.com/community/Lubuntu/Documentation/RemoveOldKernels)

item.title: Making Code Block Wrap in Jira
item.description:
It is a hack.

Set Jira Administration -> System -> Announcement Banner -> Announcement:

<style type="text/css">
pre {
    white-space: pre-wrap!important;
}
</style>

item.title: One-liner to check MongoDB Connections
item.description:
mongo --eval "JSON.stringify(db.currentOp(true))" | \
tail -n +3 | \
jq -r .inprog[].client | \
sed 's/\(.*\):.*/\1/' \
| sort | uniq -c | sort -nr
  • dump connection information in standard JSON format
  • remove MongoDB header
  • extract IP:port as a list
  • trim port
  • sort IPs by freqencies
